name: 水文地質學
description: 探討地質條件與地下水的分布、運動和儲水層水文性質之間的關係。內容包含岩性與孔隙率、地下水的運動、岩石彈性特性與主要流動方程式、地下水測試、地下水資源以及水文圈中之地下水等介紹。
goals: 本課程主要探討地質條件與地下水的分布、運動和儲水層水文性質之間的關係。本課程目標在使學生瞭解地下水及與地下水相關岩層之：1.岩性與孔隙率2.地下水的運動3.彈性特性與主要流動方程式4.地下水測試5.地下水資源6.水文圈中之地下水等特性。
syllabus:
Week1 課程簡介，Introduction to hydrogeology

Week2 Introduction to hydrogeology

Week3 Origin of porosity and permeability

Week4 Groundwater movement (I)

Week5 Groundwater movement (II)

Week6 Groundwater movement (III)

Week7 Elastic properties and main equations of flow (I)

Week8 Elastic properties and main equations of flow (II)

Week9 “期中考”

Week10 Elastic properties and main equations of flow (III)

Week11 Hydraulic testing (I)

Week12 Hydraulic testing (II)

Week13 Hydraulic testing (III)

Week14 Hydraulic testing (IV)

Week15 Groundwater as a resource

Week16 Groundwater in the basin hydrologic cycle (I)

Week17 Groundwater in the basin hydrologic cycle (II)

Week18 期末考

methodologies.note: 本課程主要進行方式將由教師教授基本相關研究背景、理論基礎及研究方法。
